Integration

Codekeeper integrates directly with developer workflows on Github and other popular SCM-platforms. Source code deposits into the escrow are encrypted and fully automated. No coding required!

is a popular development tool that many companies use to handle their source code management and deployments.

How works with Codekeeper

Codekeeper connects to via , which means you can easily deposit your source code and keep it in sync.
